body.para: *** This bug is a duplicate of bug 349469 *** https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/349469

** This bug is no longer a duplicate of bug 746912 package man-db 2.5.9-4 failed to install/upgrade: subprocess installed
post-installation script returned error exit status 1 ** This bug has been marked a duplicate of bug 349469 debconf: DbDriver "config": /var/cache/debconf/config.dat is locked by
another process: Resource temporarily unavailable
-- You received this bug notification because you are a member of Ubuntu Bugs, which is subscribed to Ubuntu. https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/800801
Title: package man-db 2.5.9-4 failed to install/upgrade: subprocess installed post-installation script returned error exit status 1
